posts.post_content: Looking for nice grade, 6 or higher. PSA or SGC graded, thanks.....

Kevin-

there's a sharp example in Goodwin, ends tonight. SGC 80 (6)

also there's a lower grade, but rare, PSA 2 with an American Beauty 460 back in Love of the Game's current auction. (FYI- neither of these are my cards, just wanted to help ya out).


PS- LOTG also has some low-pop high-grade T206's, which i know you collect.
